title: Seg-fault with pr2 in a VRC world

content.raw:
During some stress-testing of drcsim, we inserted multiple pr2's into vrc_task_1.world and observe occasional seg-faults. Here's is a Release-mode backtrace that appears to point to ODE's collision checking for the MultiRayShape used by the RaySensor:
~~~
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f4b4e466ee5 in _dCalcVectorDot3 (step_a=1, b=0x7f4a3e9d57d0, 
    a=0x158, step_b=1)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:178
#1  dCalcVectorDot3 (b=0x7f4a3e9d57d0, a=0x158)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:182
#2  dMultiplyHelper0_331 (b=0x7f4a3e9d57d0, a=0x158, res=0x7f4a3e9d5740)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:284
#3  dMultiply0_331 (b=0x7f4a3e9d57d0, a=0x158, res=0x7f4a3e9d5740)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:323
#4  dxGeom::computePosr (this=0x7f4a3eb64d40)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_kernel.cpp:460
#5  0x00007f4b4e46ccd8 in recomputePosr (this=0x7f4a3eb64d40)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_kernel.h:128
#6  recomputeAABB (this=0x7f4a3eb64d40)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_kernel.h:155
#7  recomputeAABB (this=0x7f4a3eb64d40)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_space.cpp:239
#8  dxSimpleSpace::cleanGeoms (this=0x7f4a3e9d5570)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_space.cpp:247
#9  0x00007f4b4e46cc84 in dxSimpleSpace::cleanGeoms (this=0x7f4a78fd26d0)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_space.cpp:245
#10 0x00007f4b4e46cbe4 in dxHashSpace::cleanGeoms (this=0x2b94540)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_space.cpp:418
#11 0x00007f4b4e46da07 in dxHashSpace::collide2 (this=0x2b94540, 
    _data=0x7f4a857f9670, geom=0x7f4a79731c80, 
    callback=0x7f4b4e46cb10 <swap_callback(void*, dxGeom*, dxGeom*)>)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_space.cpp:605
#12 0x00007f4b4e46dfa6 in dSpaceCollide2 (g1=0x7f4a7942c760, g2=0x2b94540, 
    data=0x7f4a3e284840, callback=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_space.cpp:814
#13 0x00007f4b4dfd29f0 in gazebo::physics::ODEMultiRayShape::UpdateRays (
    this=0x7f4a3e284840)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEMultiRayShape.cc:82
#14 0x00007f4b52373bf9 in gazebo::physics::MultiRayShape::Update (
    this=0x7f4a3e284840)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/physics/MultiRayShape.cc:167
#15 0x00007f4b520583aa in gazebo::sensors::RaySensor::UpdateImpl (
    this=0x7f4a3e283da0)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc:276
#16 0x00007f4b5205eee9 in gazebo::sensors::Sensor::Update (
    this=0x7f4a3e283da0, _force=false)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/sensors/Sensor.cc:153
#17 0x00007f4b52063d87 in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::SensorContainer::Update (this=0x42c6e20, _force=false)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:532
#18 0x00007f4b520652ae in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::SensorContainer::RunLoop (this=0x42c6e20)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:491
#19 0x00007f4b50f43ce9 in thread_proxy ()
   from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#20 0x00007f4b51aade9a in start_thread (arg=0x7f4a857fa700)
    at pthread_create.c:308
#21 0x00007f4b502eccbd in clone ()
    at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#22 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
~~~
content.html:
During some stress-testing of drcsim, we inserted multiple pr2's into vrc_task_1.world and observe occasional seg-faults. Here's is a Release-mode backtrace that appears to point to ODE's collision checking for the MultiRayShape used by the RaySensor:

(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007f4b4e466ee5 in _dCalcVectorDot3 (step_a=1, b=0x7f4a3e9d57d0, 
    a=0x158, step_b=1)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:178
#1  dCalcVectorDot3 (b=0x7f4a3e9d57d0, a=0x158)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:182
#2  dMultiplyHelper0_331 (b=0x7f4a3e9d57d0, a=0x158, res=0x7f4a3e9d5740)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/include/ode/odemath.h:284
#3  dMultiply0_331 (b=0x7f4a3e9d57d0, a=0x158, res=0x7f4a3e9d5740)

#10 0x00007f4b4e46cbe4 in dxHashSpace::cleanGeoms (this=0x2b94540)

    _data=0x7f4a857f9670, geom=0x7f4a79731c80, 
    callback=0x7f4b4e46cb10 <swap_callback(void*, dxGeom*, dxGeom*)>)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_space.cpp:605
#12 0x00007f4b4e46dfa6 in dSpaceCollide2 (g1=0x7f4a7942c760, g2=0x2b94540, 
    data=0x7f4a3e284840, callback=<optimized out>)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/deps/opende/src/collision_space.cpp:814
#13 0x00007f4b4dfd29f0 in gazebo::physics::ODEMultiRayShape::UpdateRays (
    this=0x7f4a3e284840)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEMultiRayShape.cc:82
#14 0x00007f4b52373bf9 in gazebo::physics::MultiRayShape::Update (
    this=0x7f4a3e284840)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/physics/MultiRayShape.cc:167
#15 0x00007f4b520583aa in gazebo::sensors::RaySensor::UpdateImpl (
    this=0x7f4a3e283da0)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.cc:276
#16 0x00007f4b5205eee9 in gazebo::sensors::Sensor::Update (
    this=0x7f4a3e283da0, _force=false)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/sensors/Sensor.cc:153
#17 0x00007f4b52063d87 in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::SensorContainer::Update (this=0x42c6e20, _force=false)
    at /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo3/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:532
